version_description:
THE JOURNEY CONTINUES
- Fight in the epic Chinese Temple and experience the soul of Far East mythology.
- Conquer new maps and events with additional storylines.
- You can now get Bonus Characters in the 3 vs. 3 Events.

POWERFUL NEW HEROES
- Embark upon a legendary quest to save Heaven itself!
- Discover new fighters, bringing the complete roster to more than 30.
- Play every week and receive new, never-before-seen warriors.

TALK OF HEAVEN
- The new Chat feature lets you communicate with anyone playing the game.
- Talk to everyone in the Global Chat or keep the conversation between your friends.

THE JOURNEY CONTINUES
- Fight in the epic Chinese Temple and experience the soul of Far East mythology.
- Conquer new maps and events with additional storylines.
- You can now get Bonus Characters in the 3 vs. 3 Events.

POWERFUL NEW HEROES
- Embark upon a legendary quest to save Heaven itself!
- Discover new fighters, bringing the complete roster to more than 30.
- Play every week and receive new, never-before-seen warriors.

TALK OF HEAVEN
- The new Chat feature lets you communicate with anyone playing the game.
- Talk to everyone in the Global Chat or keep the conversation between your friends.

THE JOURNEY CONTINUES
- Fight in the epic Chinese Temple and experience the soul of Far East mythology.
- Conquer new maps and events with additional storylines.
- You can now get Bonus Characters in the 3 vs. 3 Events.

POWERFUL NEW HEROES
- Embark upon a legendary quest to save Heaven itself!
- Discover new fighters, bringing the complete roster to more than 30.
- Play every week and receive new, never-before-seen warriors.

TALK OF HEAVEN
- The new Chat feature lets you communicate with anyone playing the game.
- Talk to everyone in the Global Chat or keep the conversation between your friends.

THE JOURNEY CONTINUES
- Fight in the epic Chinese Temple and experience the soul of Far East mythology.
- Conquer new maps and events with additional storylines.
- You can now get Bonus Characters in the 3 vs. 3 Events.

POWERFUL NEW HEROES
- Embark upon a legendary quest to save Heaven itself!
- Discover new fighters, bringing the complete roster to more than 30.
- Play every week and receive new, never-before-seen warriors.

TALK OF HEAVEN
- The new Chat feature lets you communicate with anyone playing the game.
- Talk to everyone in the Global Chat or keep the conversation between your friends.

FORGE A DIVINE ALLIANCE!
- Create an Alliance of fellow Ascenders or join an existing one.
- Choose between a Closed Alliance (only invited members may join), or an Open Alliance (anyone can join).
- Looking for an Alliance? No worries; we’ll recommend the best ones for you.
- Customize your emblem to give your group a unique style that others will remember.
- Manage your team with invites and the ability to accept or refuse members. Your Alliance, your rules!
- Help your Alliance mates when they need Energy or Stamina.

THE WRATH OF EGYPT
- The most epic gods of Egypt have been summoned to battle.
- Osiris, Ra, Cleopatra, Anubis, Seth and Sobek will fight to protect their divine purview.
- Feel the mighty souls of the pharaohs in the new ancient-Egypt arena.
- Complete the new Act and discover more of the Gods of Rome story.

AN EVEN BIGGER ROSTER
- Now totaling 40 immortal warriors. Master the might of them all!
- Discover a new hero every week!

FORGE A DIVINE ALLIANCE!
- Create an Alliance of fellow Ascenders or join an existing one.
- Choose between a Closed Alliance (only invited members may join), or an Open Alliance (anyone can join).
- Looking for an Alliance? No worries; we’ll recommend the best ones for you.
- Customize your emblem to give your group a unique style that others will remember.
- Manage your team with invites and the ability to accept or refuse members. Your Alliance, your rules!
- Help your Alliance mates when they need Energy or Stamina.

THE WRATH OF EGYPT
- The most epic gods of Egypt have been summoned to battle.
- Osiris, Ra, Cleopatra, Anubis, Seth and Sobek will fight to protect their divine purview.
- Feel the mighty souls of the pharaohs in the new ancient-Egypt arena.
- Complete the new Act and discover more of the Gods of Rome story.

AN EVEN BIGGER ROSTER
- Now totaling 40 immortal warriors. Master the might of them all!
- Discover a new hero every week!

ARES: THE WAR GOD
- The personification of violence and war challenges you in the most brutal event yet! Are you brave enough to enter ""The House of Ares""?
NEW ELEMENTAL SHARDS
- Collect Shards as you complete quests. Then fuse them into monumental Spheres to unlock 3- & 4-star champions for your roster!
ALLIANCE EVENTS
- Fight united with your allies towards a common goal and reap great rewards for your victory!
MORE NEW CHALLENGERS ASCEND
- Romulus & Remus: Twin brothers abandoned after birth and raised by a wolf.
- Artemis: Goddess of the hunt, wilderness and wild animals whose fury is untamable.
- Guan Yu: General of the Han Dynasty, wielding the legendary Jade Dragon Crescent Blade.
- Centurion Julius: An incomparable leader whose power inspires armies to rally around him.
SAVE ON DISK SPACE!
- The game now takes up 40% less space! Lighter and more powerful!

Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

GILGAMESH, KING OF URUK

Rumored to be two-part god and one part man, Gilgamesh was the king of the ancient city of Uruk and is known for his superhuman strenght. After the death of his friend Enkidu, Gilgamesh set out to find the secrets of eternal life. His strength and determination guided him through many adventures.

JOURNEY TO LEVEL 70

Continue your adventures and become more powerful as you grow upward to level 70.

KUMIHO, THE DEMON FOX
A shape-shifter demon in search for fresh prey.

COLLECTION 2.0
An improved way to manage your Fighters collection.
